TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Bureaucracy - Monthly Budgets, Reimagined (1.7 - 01/07/2024 (Under New Management))

Articles.Content:
Just a discussion point from the maintainer:

Would it be useful to stop time warp when an event fires in the game?  Right now it just keeps speeding along and the player has to stop it.  Unsure if this behavior is desirable.  It's a new thing that's been happening in my game since I decoupled events from the scene change, and made them truly random.

Also if you have any ideas for the mod, post them.  I may not implement them all but I am open to concepts.  Right now I am kind of eyeballing "Bank of Kerbin" and wondering if we should mess with how it works.
